ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Parallel NEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: There was a discussion around the new year I think regarding the different parallel computing models, e.g. I prefer the island model where each node runs NEAT

There was a discussion around the new year I think regarding the 
different parallel computing models, e.g. I prefer the island model 
where each node runs NEAT pretty much independently of the other nodes 
but with an occasional passing around of the best genomes between 
nodes/islands. I haven't got around to doing anythin gliek this yet though.

What I will be doing fairly soon is creating a multi-threaded version of 
SharpNEAT to utilize multi-core CPU's. I thought about it and I think it 
will be easy to do - an evening or two say. Anyway I just put an order 
in for a new dual core PC so that should be an incentive :)

Colin.
